title: HTML, CSS & JavaScript
description: Proficient in writing clean JavaScript, crafting semantic HTML markup, and creating visually appealing responsive CSS for building dynamic web applications.

title: Angular & React
description: Experienced in developing scalable web apps with Angular, leveraging its powerful features and modular architecture. Proficient in creating reusable UI components with React.

title: AWS
description: Certified AWS Solutions Architect and Developer Associate with hands-on experience in deploying & managing applications using services like EC2, S3, and Lambda.

title: Bootstrap & Tailwind CSS
description: Experienced in rapidly building responsive, visually appealing UIs with Bootstrap's components. Proficient in utilizing Tailwind CSS for custom, utility-first designs.

title: Python
description: Proficient in utilizing Python for developing data science and machine learning models, leveraging frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow.

title: SQL, Postgres & Snowflake
description: Skilled in writing optimized SQL queries, managing PostgreSQL databases, and leveraging Snowflake for scalable data warehousing and analytics.

title: Kubernetes & Docker
description: Experienced in containerizing applications with Docker and orchestrating deployments using Kubernetes for efficient resource utilization and high availability.

title: Tableau & Excel
description: Adept at creating interactive data visualizations with Tableau for effective data exploration. Skilled in leveraging Excel for data analysis and reporting.
